name: createScoreConfig
description: Create a custom score configuration selecting the weight for each background check dataset and the country where it applies. Weights are numbers between 0 and 1 that represent how impactful the dataset is for the score. Keep in mind that the sum of all weights must equal 1.

CreateConfigInput.description: Represents paramaters required to create a score configuration

country.description: Country where this set of rules applies. Use "all" if the check type searches by name by relying on international databases

dataset_affiliations_and_insurances.description: Affiliation and insurance weight for score calculation. From 0 to 1

dataset_alert_in_media.description: Alert in media weight for score calculation. From 0 to 1

dataset_business_background.description: Business background weight for score calculation. From 0 to 1

dataset_criminal_record.description: Criminal record weight for score calculation. From 0 to 1

dataset_driving_licenses.description: Driving license weight for score calculation. From 0 to 1

dataset_international_background.description: International background weight for score calculation. From 0 to 1

dataset_legal_background.description: Legal background weight for score calculation. From 0 to 1

dataset_personal_identity.description: Personal identity weight for score calculation. From 0 to 1

dataset_professional_background.description: Professional background weight for score calculation. From 0 to 1

dataset_taxes_and_finances.description: Taxes and financial background weight for score calculation. From 0 to 1

dataset_traffic_fines.description: Traffic fines weight for score calculation. From 0 to 1

dataset_vehicle_information.description: Vehicle information weight for score calculation. From 0 to 1

dataset_vehicle_permits.description: Vehicle certificate background weight for score calculation. From 0 to 1

type.description: Score configuration name. It cannot be person, vehicle, or company

$block: Represents a list of score configurations that apply in the country

$ul: **ScoreConfigByCountry**: List of score configs that apply for the country

$block:
The error type is returned when an error occurred in the platform.

Error codes include:

- 10404: resource was not found
